jobInfo.postDescription:
主要职责
    
1. 配置硬件和软件系统，包括服务器，测试仪，PC机 
    
2. 开发测试序列 
    
3. 办公室测试
    
4. 执行现场调试 
    
5. 负责客户培训
    
6. 负责现场陪产
    
  7. 负责现场设备的简单维护
    
  8. 保持与客户的良好沟通 
    
  任职要求
    
  1. 电气工程或计算机、自动化或其他相关专业背景（BA / FH / TH） 
    
  2. 2年的工作经验优先
    
  3. 对车载电器和电子产品很感兴趣 
    
  4. 编程技巧，熟悉C / C ++或java。 
    
  5. 具备基本的Linux知识者优先
    
6. 熟悉ECU通信协议如KW2000，UDS等优先 
    
7. 熟悉BUS的知识，如CAN，K线等优先

brandComInfo.introduce:
DSA Daten- und Systemtechnik GmbH是一家成立于1980年的德国家族企业，专注于汽车行业覆盖整体汽车生命周期的电子电器及IT诊断解决方案。在过去的四十多年中，开发了大量软硬件解决方案。
这些解决方案在全球超过70个OEM使用，诸多知名汽车企业都使用DSA的诊断方案去确保汽车的质量。1994年DSA在上海大众安装了中国首套电气检测系统，从那以后DSA在整个中国为超过五十多个客户安装了超过4000台测试终端。我们2003年开始在中国实施本土化业务，并且在上海成立了中国区总部，于2009年在长春成立了分公司，我们在中国市场上受到了很多客户的信任并成为其核心的诊断系统供应商。我们的解决方案根据客户本土化的需求进行优化（语言，操作习惯，数据显示，培训），而且会让我们的客户用国际标准去执行诊断和测试。
DSA一直走在诊断领域的前沿，为客户始终提供最优质，高效的解决方案及专业服务。
DSA Daten und Systemtechnik GmbH is a German company founded in 1980, focusing on the automotive industry covering the entire automotive life cycle of electronic and electrical and IT diagnostic solutions. In the past 40 years, a large number of software and hardware solutions have been developed.
These solutions are used by more than 70 OEMs around the world, and many well-known automobile companies use DSA diagnostic solutions to ensure the quality of vehicles. In 1994, DSA installed China's first electrical testing system in Shanghai Volkswagen. Since then, DSA has installed more than 4000 test terminals for more than 50 customers in China. We started to implement localization business in China in 2003, and set up China regional headquarters in Shanghai. We are trusted by many customers in the Chinese market and become its core diagnostic system supplier. Our solutions are optimized according to the customer's localization needs (language, operating habits, data display, training), and will allow our customers to perform diagnostics and tests using international standards.
DSA has been in the forefront of the field of diagnosis, providing customers with the best quality, efficient solutions and professional services.
